result.html: Is mór an trua sinThat's a shame.
result.ponchtml: Is mór an trua sinThat's a shame.

result.eng: I find my being Irish no cause for shame.
result.ga: Ní údar náire domsa a bheith i m'Éireannach
result.orig: Ní údar náire domsa a bheith i m'Éireannach
result.html: Ní údar náire domsa a bheith i m'ÉireannachI find my being Irish no cause for shame.
result.ponchtml: Ní údar náire domsa a ḃeiṫ i m'ÉireannaċI find my being Irish no cause for shame.

result.eng: It's a shame I didn't get an education when I was young.
result.ga: Ba mhór an truaighe nach bhfuair mé foghlaim i m'óige
result.orig: Ba mhór an truaighe nach bhfuair mé foghlaim i m'óige
result.html: Ba mhór an truaighe nach bhfuair mé foghlaim i m'óigeIt's a shame I didn't get an education when I was young.
result.ponchtml: Ba ṁór an truaiġe naċ ḃfuair mé foġlaim i m'óigeIt's a shame I didn't get an education when I was young.
